room_title: Escape room "Christmas VR" by Questledge in Springfield (MO)
room_description:
Christmas is under threat! Santa has got caught in a blizzard, he’s lost all the presents and can’t find his way home... Only you can save Christmas. To help Santa find his house, you need to light the lights on the biggest Christmas tree in the forest. But before you do that you’ll have to get to where Santa lives in the North Pole and get everything back in order. Find out why the magic elves don’t want to work and the presents aren’t getting to the children. And with Santa’s best reindeer hurry to revive the first Christmas tree! To help Santa find his house, you need to light the lights on the biggest Christmas tree in the forest. Sounds easy... right?

Christmas is not a video game. It is an escape game experience set in Santa's house and workshop in virtual reality. You will experience a realistic adventure as if you were there. Never alone, as part of a team (of 2 or 4), you become the hero and experience totally safe situations that would be far too dangerous or just impossible to live in real life. Developed by ARVI, the next generation of social virtual reality experience.
